name: Thermacell Single Pack Refill 12 Hours
description: Everything you need to keep your butane powered Thermacell repeller going for 12 hours of mosquito protection.Provides 5m dome of protection in 10–30 minutes.Each mat lasts for up to 4 hours and goes from blue to white once empty, making it easy to know when to change the mat.Butane canister lasts for up 12 hours.Kit includes 1 butane canister and 3 mats.
